name: topographically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to topography (= the physical appearance of the natural features of land): The topographically varied forest includes seven wilderness areas. The map is topographically inaccurate and of little use in retracing the route. See
topography
More examplesFewer examplesTopographically, both regions have large areas of upland and mountain.Cape Town is a topographically stunning city offering visitors beach, city, and mountain.Topographically, the area is flat and criss- crossed with canals.
